@package xhb-requests
@version 0.1.0.6.2015.8.1

module Graphics.XHB.Requests
class Request a
requestIO :: Request a => a -> Connection -> IO ()
class RequestWithReply a b | a -> b, b -> a
requestWithReplyIO :: RequestWithReply a b => a -> Connection -> IO (IO (Either SomeError b))
